name: Adrift (Blawnode)
description:
This version is UNPLAYABLE. This is intentional.

The project has been opened to the public in order for Devlogs to be released as we are continuing to work on the game.

Currently, there's only credits, and a nice music track to go along with this gallery. 

-------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD to move.

E to interact with objects.

-------------------------------------------------------

The jam game for "A Jam with Blawnode #1", continued!

Status: "Adrift August", Stage 2.2.

This used to be a 5-day jam game by Blawnode, Ajoeb "KingKelpo" Gaasim, Nazsgull, NoStereo, redsti and Gene "sound_digitator" Chaban.Since then, we've been planning on a complete experience.
And here it is, in the works!

Nowadays, it is I, redsti and NoStereo who work on Adrift.

Art: Blawnode, KingKelpo.

Code: Blawnode, Nazsgull, redsti.

Music: NoStereo.

SFX: sound_digitator.

Made with Unity 2020.3.17f1.
